items.title: Apple: $500 Billion Problem
items.description: Apple's $500B U.S. investment falls short on innovation, especially in AI. AAPL stock trades at rich valuations despite limited growth. See more here.

items.title: Trump says TSMC will spend $100 billion to expand chip manufacturing in U.S.
items.description: Trump says TSMC will spend $100 billion to expand chip manufacturing in U.S.

items.title: Berkshire Hathaway: Buffett Sells Banks, Buys Beer And Pizza As Economic Indicators Worsen
items.description: Warren Buffett has sold record amounts of stock over the past 18 months but hasn't given the public much information as to why. Read more on the inflation-resistant picks made by Berkshire.
